Environmental Responsibility Report  |  2018 Progress Report, Covering FY2017 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 Packaging Plastic  Footprint  Review  
Client: Apple Inc. 3 Based on the process and procedures conducted , there is no evidence that the  packaging 
plastic footprint is not materially correct and is not a fair representation of plastic data and 
information . The excellent analysis meets the principles of good scientific practice. 
 
Berlin, April 6 , 2018 
  
  
- Marina Proske -  - Karsten Schischke - 
Fraunhofer IZM  Fraunhofer IZM 
Dept. Environmental and Dept. Environmental and  
Reliability Engineering  Reliability Engineering
